banner.p: Dedicated to the development of web applications since 2020, focused and determined, self-taught and in the constant search to learn and incorporate new knowledge. I am a person who enjoys teamwork, always giving my best to achieve goals.

projects.videogame-description: Retro video game made with React. Only for Desktop or notebook
projects.list-pokemons-description: Pagination done with Fetch, consuming 'PokeAPI' API resources.
projects.text-to-speech-description: Narrator using SpeechSynthesis API, where logic written in JavaScript takes the text entered by the user and outputs it through audio devices.Not available for Mobile.
projects.qr-generator-description: This generator is made with logic written in JavaScript, consuming data from the 'qrserver' API.
projects.pelispedia-description: Using React we carried out this movie encyclopedia project, within the framework of the React Side by Side Course.
